overview_of_class: French 125-2 is the second quarter of the three-quarter Intensive Intermediate French course for students who have completed French 125-1 or have been placed in that course by the French department. The primary goal of this course is to strengthen oral and written communication skills by immersing students in authentic cultural contexts and language. A review of essential grammar will reinforce linguistic foundations. Class meets three times a week and will be conducted in French.
name: Intensive Intermediate French
subject: FRENCH
